lessons.title: Basic Stance: Zenkutsu-dachi
lessons.text: Zenkutsu-dachi is a front stance. Stand with one leg forward and the other back, keeping your knees bent.

quiz.question: Which stance has one leg forward and one leg back?
quiz.explanation: Zenkutsu-dachi is a front stance with one leg forward and one back.

lessons.title: Straight Punch: Oi-zuki
lessons.text: Oi-zuki is a straight punch. Start in Zenkutsu-dachi and punch forward with your fist.

quiz.question: Which hand do you punch with in Oi-zuki?
quiz.explanation: In Oi-zuki, you can punch with either hand, but both is correct in practice.

lessons.title: Front Kick: Mae-geri
lessons.text: Mae-geri is a front kick. Lift your knee and kick straight ahead with the ball of your foot.

lessons.title: Knife-Hand Block: Shuto-uke
lessons.text: Shuto-uke is a knife-hand block. Use the side of your hand to block an attack.

quiz.question: Which block uses an open hand?
quiz.explanation: Shuto-uke uses an open hand to block.
